page.title: 13Local Industry
page.content: {FIBRE GLASS FACTORY In Hadlow there is one factory,a fibre glass factory.It employs both men and women.My father works there and so does my friend's father.My dad works at the back of the yard.They make fish ponds,tanks,pots,tools and many other things too.My dad sometimes cuts himself on the machines.When he makes the pots he gets his hands dirty so he has to use Fairy Liquid to clean them. {THE GRAIN STORE(Cuckoo Lane) Mr.Griffiths told us abut the grain store.The farmers bring their corn there to be cleaned and dried ready for market.They export 2000tons a month.The total is 20000tons.Some of the grain goes to Ethiopia.They also deal with rape,peas,tick beans,wheat, oats and barley.
